Description:
Detects execution of a the file "execve_hijack" which is used by the Triple Cross rootkit as a way to elevate privileges

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Triple Cross eBPF Rootkit Execve Hijack
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/sudo' and command like '%execve_hijack%'
